examples.example: 我认真地整理课堂笔记，以便更好地复习和巩固知识。

translate.english: I carefully sort out the class notes so as to better review and consolidate knowledge.

examples.example: 我仔细地整理笔记，从中学到了很多有用的东西。

translate.english: I carefully sorted out the notes and learned a lot of useful things from them.

examples.example: 我经常翻阅以前的笔记，从中获得新的启发和灵感。

translate.english: I often look through previous notes and get new inspiration and inspiration from them.
